option.od: print the help message and exit.
register the task under the name taskname with the Operating System.
send error messages to the task registered under the name errlogname with the Operating System.
attach the task to the version of echo_data registered under the name echoname with the Operating System.
filter the data and serve only data from channel A or channel B.
listen for remote connections on port number port.

synopsis.p: A data relay task for distributing data over the internet.
